posts.post_content: Although my favorite is Light and Shadow, I think this is the best Sword because it gives you the ability to deal direct damage and it gives you card advantage in let's say, White. posts.post_content:
@ Hunter06: I must respectfully disagree.  
  
I think the new art is phenomenal, and leagues beyond the old. I understand the abstract appeal of the old art, but the new is simply sharper, bolder, and badder-ass. Also, being that these swords (for some stupid reason) aren't legendary, I appreciate that Wizards is streamlining them and making them look like generic swords, because that's what they are.  
  
Anyway, still an amazing card, art disputes aside.

posts.post_content:
\*Start art rant\*  
I'm just going to come out and say it, this art is worse than its old art...  
the old art was very distinct and abstract, this is just a flaming, icy sword. the old art looked very different from its new cousins, now he looks just like the rest of em. :/  
\*End art rant\*  
  
As for the functionally of this card, auto 5/5, its not busted to the point of stupidity like Jitte or Skull \*Clamp or Batter\* but it is very powerful and will turn heads

Posted By: Splizer (6/14/2013 1:33:51 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Loving the new art. Already ordered one even though I almost just got the old one. The new art is just too awesome to pass up.  
  
I also want to point out how strong this card is. You get to clear out utility creatures or deal even more damage to the player. The extra card draw means that after 1 hit, even if they remove it next turn, it is a 2-for-1. This card is just really strong. It's also a good source of colourless draw.  
  
If your opponent has a blue/red deck, if they can't dig out an answer, they likely get steamrolled.  
  
EDIT  
Finally got this in the mail. It looks so good. All 5 of my swords match now :) I like the old art, but all the new, matching art looks better together.
posts.html:

If your opponent has a blue/red deck, if they can't dig out an answer, they likely get steamrolled.
